title: Frontend Developer - Irvin Sebastian Garcia Flores
description: Web Frontend Developer from Baja California, México. Specialist in HTML5, CSS5, JavaScript ES6+, Vue.js and Wix.

hero.title: Hello I'm Irvin Sebastian Garcia Flores!
hero.description: Specialist in HTML5, CSS5, JavaScript ES6+, Vue.js and Wix.

jobs_description.title: Frontend Developer
jobs_description.description: Responsible for the design and development of specific solutions for the company's issues, collaborating with various areas within the company to improve the end user experience and in turn optimizing internal processes by implementing new features, redesigning web platforms and the App.
list: Led a complete redesign of the main App based on user data, which significantly increased satisfaction and usability
Developed and optimized key functionalities in the ERP, increasing operational efficiency by 70%
Implemented an ERP from scratch, saving the operational team more than 10 hours of work per week
Collaborated with designers and developers in the redesign of the main App to improve the user experience
Developed landing pages for products in testing phase, improving their visibility to customers
Maintained and updated the company's web pages, ensuring that information was always up to date for users

jobs_description.title: Frontend Developer
jobs_description.description: I worked on developing innovative solutions, focusing on creating features and unit testing for both Android and iOS Apps. My focus was on improving the user experience and ensuring code quality.
list: Widget development for continuous tracking in active products
Development of specific sections within Apps
Integration of unit tests in Apps using JUnit (Android) and XCTest (iOS)

jobs_description.title: Student Intern
jobs_description.description: I learned best coding practices (DRY, KISS, Documentation, design patterns), programming languages mainly PHP and Javascript, programming paradigms (Imperative, OOP, Functional), database (relational and non-relational), understanding the use of Tools and IDE, unit testing and debugging.
list: Integration of unit tests on Web using Jest

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: I am a frontend developer who makes data driven decisions.
about.description: I am a frontend developer with more than 5 years of experience in creating innovative digital solutions. My focus is on improving user experience and optimizing operational efficiency through the development of web interfaces and mobile applications. Throughout my career, I have led redesign projects, implemented ERPs that have saved weekly work hours, and collaborated with design and development teams to deliver high-impact products. In addition, I specialize in modern technologies such as Vue.js, Figma, Kotlin and Swift, and have a strong focus on code quality through unit testing.
